Slides.Description: After the Vancouver Canucks loose against the Boston Bruins in the Stanley Cup playoffs riots break out in downtown Vancouver which last for more than 6 hours.
Anti-Bruins slogans on a wall in downtown Vancouver.
A broadcast helicopter and a group of spectators watching the riots.
Spectators recording how the events evolve from the top of a building.
What Impression Will You Leave? ...
Richards Street at the beginning of the riots.
A rioter jumps from a burning car.
Burning vehicles cover downtown Vancouver in a big cloud of smoke.
A devastated fan resting at  the side of the road.
Burning cars in a car park.
Rioters trying to tip a demolished car on its roof.
A rioter is demolishing a burning car with a hockey stick.
A burning manequin on Granville Street.
A rioter is attacking a pub employee who was trying to defend the property with an umbrella.
A man is playing a trumpet next to a burning car.
An employee of The Bay is telling a lady to fucking stay outside.
A young men is leaving a shop after stealing a bag.
A girl is spraying GO on a wall.
Several young man loot a suitcase store.
A man is jumping on a hood of a demolished car.
A  party is taking place behind the Vancouver Art Gallery.
The riot police is entering the scene.
A police officer with a dog.
Blood on the ground.
A rioter is hit in his face by a load of tear gas.
A police officer is threatening a couple with his gun.
A looter is taking off after smashing into a bystander.
A man is washing off tear gas from his face at St. Pauls Hospital.
The morning after: A young girl is writing on the boarded up windows of The Bay shopping complex.
